p: TIANamp Genomic DNA Kit (Tiangen, Beijing, China) was used for Genomic DNA extraction, and then the DNA was treated with sodium bisulfite by EZ DNA Methylation Kit (Zymo Research, USA). The BSP primers were designed by the online MethPrimer software 14 and Primer 5.0 (Table 6). As the methods described by Cai et al. [ 35], PCR products were subcloned and sequenced. Six samples from the mandarin fish of Group W or X were analyzed with five technical replicates.
